fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Contrastive Predictive Decoding
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: @misc{oord2019representationlearningcontrastivepredictive, title={Representation Learning with Contrastive Predictive Coding}, author={Aaron van den Oord and Yazhe Li and Oriol Vinyals}, year={2019}, eprint={1807.03748}, archivePrefix={arXiv}, primaryClass={cs.LG}, url={https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.03748}, }

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The InfoNCE loss aims to minimize the following information-theoretic objective \mathcal {L}_{N} = - \mathbb {E}_{\mathcal {X}} \left [\log \frac {f_k(x_{t + k}, c_t)}{\sum _{x_j \in \mathcal {X}} f_k(x_j, c_t)}\right ]
\mathcal {L}_N from Contrastive Predictive Decoding maximizes a lower bound on the Mutual Information between x_{t + k} and c_t.

fr:tree.fr:mainmatter: All we must do is plug \frac {p(x \mid c)}{p(x)} back into the objective. \begin {align*} \mathcal {L}_{\mathbb {N}}^{\text {opt}}&=-\,\mathbb {E}\log \left [\frac {\frac {p(x_{t+k}|c_{t})}{p(x_{t+k})}}{\frac {p(x_{t+k}|c_{t})}{p(x_{t+k})}+\sum _{x_{j}\in X_{\text {neg}}}\frac {p(x_{j}|c_{t})}{p(x_{j})}}\right ] \\ &=\mathbb {E}\log \left [1+\frac {p(x_{t+k})}{p(x_{t+k}|c_{t})}\sum _{x_{j}\in X_{\text {neg}}}\frac {p(x_{j}|c_{t})}{p(x_{j})}\right ] \\ &\approx \mathbb {E}\log \left [1+\frac {p(x_{t+k})}{p(x_{t+k}|c_{t})}(N-1)\,\mathbb {E}\,\frac {p(x_{j}|c_{t})}{p(x_{j})}\right ] \\ &=\mathbb {E}\log \left [1+\frac {p(x_{t+k})}{p(x_{t+k} \mid c_t)}N\right ] \\ &\geq \mathbb {E} \log \left [\frac {p(x_{t + k})}{p(x_{t + k} \mid c_t)}N \right ] \\ &= - I(x_{t + k}, c_t) + \log N \end {align*}
